snippet: The move by Ali Ben Bongo, one of Africa’s wealthiest leaders, was heralded by his circle but met with skepticism from critics who pointed out the legal and political pressure he faces.
abstract: Pres Ali Ben Bongo of Gabon, one of Africa's richest leaders, announces he is giving some of his financial holdings, including property to 'people of Gabon'; declaration is rapidly met with skepticism by critics who point to legal and political pressure he faces.
lead_paragraph: The move by Ali Ben Bongo, one of Africa’s wealthiest leaders, was heralded by his circle but met with skepticism from critics who pointed out the legal and political pressure he faces.

headline.main: Gabon’s President Offers Some of His Wealth ‘to the People’
headline.print_headline: Skepticism Over Gift From Leader of Gabon
